plot: A holiday display goes missing, sending Kevin scurrying to find out who is responsible. Tom and Christine run into trouble at a hospital and on the road.

When the baby Jesus is stolen from the public holiday display, Kevin is tasked with getting a new one, but he decides to look for the old one instead; Tom's faith is nearly shaken with Christine and he anxiously awaits a phone call from Wayne; Meg and Laurie deliver unpleasant news to Kevin; GR members steal family photographs after they create a diversion; Kevin meets Nora.—chingeeflingee
